descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value:
To help students:

  • appreciate the importance of writing in their scientific careers

  • improve the organization and clarity of their writing

  • identify strategies for revision

  • master the fundamentals of written scientific argumentation for grants and journal article

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: -The Grant Application Writer's Workbook: National Institutes of Health Version (Revised October 2010) by Stephen W. Russell and David C. Morrison
